component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command. Commands that include a name or password are case-sensitive.***
component.existingcommands: Enter interface range mode for FastEthernet0/1 and FastEthernet0/2. Display the channel-group options using context sensitive help (?).

command.instruction: Select channel-group 1 and display the next option.

command.deviceresponse: mode Etherchannel Mode of the interface
command.instruction: Enter the mode keyword and display the next option.

command.deviceresponse:
active Enable LACP unconditionally
auto Enable PAgP only if a PAgP device is detected
desirable Enable PAgP unconditionally
on Enable Etherchannel only
passive Enable LACP only if a LACP device is detected
command.instruction: Configure the channel-group to use LACP unconditionally.

command.deviceresponse:

command.instruction: Configure the switchport settings for the port-channel that was created. Configure port-channel 1 as a trunk and allow VLANS 1, 2, and 20 to cross the trunk link.
